name: Prime Horror II
description: Prime Horror II Is a Multiplayer 8 page styled horror game with a comedic skin over it. In this 4V1 player vs monster style gameplay format you can play on either side of the warehouse. Play as the nefarious Joe Bozo equipped with the soul purpose of taking on a murderous rage against your opponents, Using the environment to win the match. Or on the other end of the coin. Team up with your friends and try to escape Joe Bozo. Using your wits and a trusty flashlight set with a multitude of ways to win. From finding all the packages (acting as the pages in a 8 page horror game) or Equipping yourself with matches and burning all of Joe Bozos cult like Totems in order extinguish him.
